data.title: San Sebastian Film Festival
data.text:
José María Zabala

Spain

82 min.

Based on an iconography that mixes traditional and modern (friars, witches, executives, shepherds, Carlists, cacos, soldiers, dwarves ...) and a soundtrack of music and sounds, Zabala composed a metaphysical circus, which It alludes in a poetic and humoristic way the aspects of the Basque reality.

Carlos Serrano

Spain

98 min.

Leandro, a little man who overnight has risen to a dominant financial position, decides to avenge himself on all those people who not long ago had humiliated him. He discovers the weaknesses, defects and vulnerable points of his victims: he seduces the women who scorned him for other men, he ruins his old friends... Nevertheless, the posession of these women does not satisfy him. He brings the husbands together in his summerhouse, so that they might know their own vileness. A violent scene is produced with a tragic ending.

José Luis García Sánchez

Spain

94 min.

Antonio, an expelled university student, lives with the pregnant Manoli, the daugther of a comfortable middle class family. Both share a flat with another couple married through the church in Gibraltar. Manoli's father, Vicente, hates his son-in-law for being "a caretaker's son and a red" apart from leaving his daugther pregnant without going to the church. After Manoli's giving birth and a series of incidents between both couples and the parents of the young people, they finish up being convinced to go and live in , as antonio calls it, "The greatest bourgeois degradation". During one of the visits of Vicente and his wife Manoli to the chalet, the police appears looking for the maid of the "young gentlemen". This gives the occasion for father-in--law and son-in-law to finally get to know each other. And all finishes happily.

Maurice Dugowson

France

111 min.

A story of love and humour, but at the same time a cruel story shown through the mirror of modern day Paris. André Fragman retoruns after military service. He has the title of chemical engineer, but cannot find work. His father is a cinema projectionist, close to retirement, he lives with the memories of the cinema of his youth. Since he was small he has called his son 'Douglas Fairbanks'. Marie came to the capital four years ago to become an 'artist'. She works in a travel agents in the morning, and in the afternoon works with a small theatre company in the outskirts, whose director has chosen her for the leading role in Alice in Wonderland. André and Marie meet by chance, fall violently in love, and destroy each other.

Luigi Faccini

Italy

110 min.

The story takes place in 1924. Alessio maniardi, an eighteen year-old student lives in a Sicilian city. He falls in love with a companion Giovanna who, as a show of love, gives him a red carnation as a present. The carnation becomes a fundamental object in his life: the fascist studetns see it in his lapel and choose him as a victim. Other studetns, communists, wwant to convert it into a symbol of their group. Always in his search of Giovanna, Alessio feel alone that for him represent violence, friendship, love and politics.

Jérôme Laperrousaz

France

92 min.

As Orpheuz, the character brought to life by terence Stamp, he wants to snatch his wife (Vivian) from death. He must not look backwards, to the past, and must fight against himself. Terence will defeat himself and sacrifice himself for love, exchanging Vivian's life for his own. The plot of the action lies in science fiction: man has discovered the time machine. Terence will be the first explorer of the future. But, to attain this, he must take part ina 'fear safari', in which he will put his life in danger in front of millions of espectators, to provoke the energy which is necessary for the journey.

Alvaro Forqué

Spain

92 min.

The film relates in cinematographic form the problem of the third sex, its justification and existence in the real sorroundings of society itself. Two parallel worlds are shown: one, the hard, professional life of some artists who try to put on a music-hall show. The other world is independent but shows us what was the life of a hasbeen, an old man who in his time was an artist. To compare one time with another is the intention of the film and definitely its theme. To make the theme mean more, a character played by Alfredo Amestoy explains this world and its reality, he defends its existence and wants to make the audience inderstand.

Pascal Aubier

France

82 min.

Seven people meet every Wednesday evening in the Mme. Vaussart's clb for unattached individuals. a very peaceful atmosphere prevails at the weekly meetings. A very one day the guests begin to talk and reminisce end working out a plan. One Sunday, the members of the club go to the Park of Saint Cloud and all, very friendly, they gather around a cind of ordnance map with mysterious marks. The following Wednesday, at the club, monsieur Alain performs an impresive distribution of sub-machine guns and rifles. The next Sunday, the members go back to Saint Cloud's Park. They carry out the plan. Their plan is nothing but the logical conclusion of their lives wasted in the history of out time.

Eduardo Escorel

Brazil

85 min.

A German governess is hired to give German and piano lessons to the teenager son of a rich traditional family, in the 20s. But soon they get involved, and she teaches him love lessons instead.

Roland Klick

Federal Republic of Germany

92 min.

Based on the novel by Johannes Mario Simmel, is the story of a man with a criminal past, who receives the job of passing from East Germany and of introducing himself in the underworld of west Berlin. Bruno K., as the agents is called, wants to stop being persecuted and to start in a new place in the world in a new life with the woman he loves. For that he must kidnap to East berlin the head of the organisation which dedicates itself to helping fugitives accross the wall. But his friend Mietzi, for love of him flings herself into an adventure which will endanger Bruno's life and all his plans.

Roberto Palmari

Brazil

99 min.

Based on the novel "Totônio Pacheco", written by João Alphonsus. At the time of the decadence of the great farms of Minas Gerais, Totônio is a symbol of the golden age of state farms: old and accustomed to having all his wills obeyed. However, after moving to his son's home because of his wife's death and the resulting loneliness, he realizes that he has lost his job as a boss and is struggling to regain his prestige by moving to a brothel.

Peter Weir

Australia

115 min.

Saint Valentine's Day 1900, at a school in appleyard, Victoria, where a rigid education is handed out, the pupils prepare an excursion to a beautiful place known for its geological interest, Hanging Rock. The picnic begins with grat precision and hapiness, but at the designated time the excursionist do not return. When they return, three pupils and the mathematics teacher are missing. The disappearances upset the routine of the college and life in it. And much more, the appearance of one of the pupils a week later, who has lost his memory. What is the mystery of the tragedy of Hanging Rock?

David Wickers

United Kingdom

89 min.

A 'Thriller' which describes in a realistic and sophisticated way the world of crime and the activities of a curious type of policeman, which has given rise to a television series of the same name actually being screened in Spain.
